  • Method Details

    • addRating

      void addRating(T rating)
      Adds a new rating to the queue.
      Throws:
      QueueFullException - if the queue is at maximum capacity

    • removeOldestRating

      Optional<T> removeOldestRating()
      Removes and returns the oldest rating in the queue.
      Returns:
      Optional containing the oldest rating, or empty if queue is empty

    • getLatestRating

      Optional<T> getLatestRating()
      Retrieves the most recently added rating without removing it.
      Returns:
      Optional containing the newest rating, or empty if queue is empty

    • clearAllRatings

      void clearAllRatings()

    • isRatingQueueEmpty

      boolean isRatingQueueEmpty()

    • isRatingQueueFull

      boolean isRatingQueueFull()

    • getCurrentRatingCount

      int getCurrentRatingCount()

    • enforceRatingQueueMaxSize

      void enforceRatingQueueMaxSize()

    • calculateAverageRating

      double calculateAverageRating()
      Calculates the average of all ratings in the queue.
      Returns:
      The average rating, or 0.0 if the queue is empty

    • getMaxRatings

      int getMaxRatings()
      Gets the maximum number of ratings allowed in the queue.
      Returns:
      The maximum capacity of the ratings queue

    • enqueue

      void enqueue(T rating)
